title: Best of The Herd for 06/13/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for 06/13/2019
description:
Colin explains why he feels the Golden State Warriors dynasty will end tonight against the Toronto Raptors. He feels the Warriors simply don't have the size to win game 6 of the NBA Finals. Colin also strongly suggests the Los Angeles Lakers be smart when trading for New Orleans Pelicans F Anthony Davis. Senior NBA Insider Chris Haynes stops by to break down the NBA Finals and Kevin Durant's crushing injury. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
